title: Minion Amumu
body:
I think this would be an awesome skin.

His q could be banana peels seeing as minions love bananas
His w could remain to be tears
His e could be little strips of banana peels
His ult could be bananas

replies.body:
why would you not just do "minion" Gnar, and have him turn into the purple minion for Mega Gnar

Banana boomerang etc.

Not that Riot could, copyright infringement and everything...
